title: Chocolate éclairs
description: Raymond Blanc's recipe for chocolate éclairs is full of tips and advice, including how to freeze.Equipment and preparation: You will need a large piping bag fitted with a 1.5cm/½in fluted nozzle and a 0.5cm/¼in nozzle.
ingredients: 450g/1lb pastry cream (crème patissière), at room temperature (see Top recipe tip below)
